attributes.action: Get rishi removed as prime minister
attributes.background: Get rishi removed as prime minister I think as well as many other people rishi is not good for our country he’s making some really bad decisions and it’s effecting everyone

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be removed.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
